languages.text: "Я понимаю, что просьба весьма... обременительна. Но все же прошу Вашу Светлость подумать о моем предложении".

traits.locale_text: "Я понимаю, что просьба весьма... обременительна. Но все же прошу Вашу Светлость подумать о моем предложении".
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: "I understand that the request is quite... onerous. But I still ask Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} to consider my offer."
languages.original_text: "Я понимаю, что просьба весьма... обременительна. Но все же прошу Вашу Светлость подумать о моем предложении".

traits.locale_text: "I understand that the request is quite... onerous. But I still ask Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} to consider my offer."
traits.speaker: Player

traits.locale_text: "I understand that the request is quite... onerous. But I still ask Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} to consider my offer."

traits.locale_text: "I understand that the request is quite... onerous. But I still ask Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} to consider my offer."

traits.locale_text: "I understand that the request is quite... onerous. But I still ask Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} to consider my offer."
traits.speaker: Player

traits.locale_text: "I understand that the request is quite... onerous. But I still ask Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} to consider my offer."
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: « Je comprends que cette requête puisse paraître pour le moins... coûteuse. Mais je demande néanmoins à Votre Seigneurie d'y réfléchir. »
languages.original_text: "I understand that the request is quite... onerous. But I still ask Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} to consider my offer."

traits.locale_text: « Je comprends que cette requête puisse paraître pour le moins... coûteuse. Mais je demande néanmoins à Votre Seigneurie d'y réfléchir. »
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: “我明白，这个要求相当……苛刻，但我仍请求您考虑一下我的提议。”
languages.original_text: "I understand that the request is quite... onerous. But I still ask Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} to consider my offer."

traits.locale_text: “我明白，这个要求相当……苛刻，但我仍请求您考虑一下我的提议。”
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: "Mir ist bewusst, dass die Bitte recht ... lästig ist. Aber ich möchte Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} dennoch bitten, mein Angebot in Erwägung zu ziehen."
languages.original_text: "I understand that the request is quite... onerous. But I still ask Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} to consider my offer."

traits.locale_text: "Mir ist bewusst, dass die Bitte recht ... lästig ist. Aber ich möchte Euer {mf|Lordschaft|Ladyschaft} dennoch bitten, mein Angebot in Erwägung zu ziehen."
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: «Sé que lo que le pido es bastante... complicado. Pero le ruego a que considere mi oferta».
languages.original_text: "I understand that the request is quite... onerous. But I still ask Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} to consider my offer."

traits.locale_text: «Sé que lo que le pido es bastante... complicado. Pero le ruego a que considere mi oferta».
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: 「その要求がとても…重要なものであることは理解しています。ですが、陛下に、私の提案を検討していただくことをお願いいたします」
languages.original_text: "I understand that the request is quite... onerous. But I still ask Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} to consider my offer."

traits.locale_text: 「その要求がとても…重要なものであることは理解しています。ですが、陛下に、私の提案を検討していただくことをお願いいたします」
traits.speaker: Player

languages.text: "Talebimin hayli... Külfetli olduğunu biliyorum. Yine de zatıaliniz {mf|Lord|Leydi} Hazretleri'nden teklifimi düşünmesini isterim."
languages.original_text: "I understand that the request is quite... onerous. But I still ask Your {mf|Lordship|Ladyship} to consider my offer."
